alert.note: Alert for Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 19 at 2:52PM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Northwestern Orangeburg, Central Orangeburg and Southeastern Orangeburg Counties. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and hazardous road conditions. Some power outages and tree damage will likely occur with these potential ice amounts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg
